name: Sovren - wake up Directed by ActionAde

metadata.name: Sovren - wake up (Directed by Action!Ade)
metadata.description: Chicago - based now NYC resident artist Sovren is making waves in the fashion and music industry, he enters into the Web 3 community with hit music video "Wake Up" featured on "BET" this video is a collaboration with Sovren a multifaceted creative deeply imbedded in the fashion culture for the past 5 years and visual artist Action!Ade  a creative director, filmmaker  and animator who has worked with the biggest names in the music industry to date(post malone, Swae Lee), these 2 have come together to present their first visual collaboration.  " These visuals are our painting, treat the colors and angles represented in this video like they are strokes from a paintbrush" - Action! Ade .
